mapper.select:
SELECT m.memberNum,name,birth,tel,phone,zip,addr1,addr2,m.status,TO_CHAR(created,'YYYY-MM-DD')created,email, saveFilename,originalFilename,m.departmentNum,departmentName,m.positionNum,positionName,b.basicpay FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN memberdetailinfo i ON m.memberNum=i.memberNum LEFT OUTER JOIN department d ON m.departmentNum=d.departmentNum LEFT OUTER JOIN position p ON m.positionNum=p.positionNum LEFT OUTER JOIN basicpay b ON m.memberNum=b.memberNum
WHERE m.memberNum=#{memberNum}
SELECT birth,email,tel,phone,zip,addr1,addr2 FROM memberDetailinfo WHERE memberNum=#{memberNum}
SELECT memberNum,basicpay FROM basicpay WHERE memberNum=#{memberNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basicpay(memberNum, basicpay, changeDate) VALUES(#{memberNum},#{basicpay},SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO qualify(qualifyNum, memberNum, qualifyCode, qualifyName, serialNum, getDate) VALUES(qualify_seq.NEXTVAL,#{memberNum},#{qualifyCode},#{qualifyName},#{serialNum},#{getDate})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM member m JOIN department d ON m.departmentNum=d.departmentNum JOIN position p ON m.positionNum=p.positionNum LEFT OUTER JOIN memberDetailinfo i ON m.memberNum=i.memberNum
SELECT departmentNum,departmentName FROM department WHERE departmentType=1
SELECT positionNum,positionName FROM position ORDER BY positionstep
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET userPwd=#{userPwd}, modified=SYSDATE WHERE memberNum=#{memberNum}
UPDATE basicpay SET basicpay=#{basicpay},changeDate=SYSDATE WHERE memberNum=#{memberNum}
UPDATE qualify SET qualify qualifyCode=#{qualifyCode},qualifyName=#{qualifyName},serialNum=#{serialNum}, getDate=#{getDate} WHERE memberNum=#{memberNum}
mapper.select: SELECT d1.departmentNum, d1.parentDepartment, d2.departmentName parentDeptName, d1.departmentName , d1.deptGroup, d1.deptOrder, m.memberNum, m.name, p.positionName, p.positionStep FROM department d1 LEFT OUTER JOIN department d2 ON d2.departmentNum = d1.parentDepartment LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON d1.departmentNum = m.departmentNum LEFT OUTER JOIN position p ON m.positionNum = p.positionNum ORDER BY d1.deptGroup, d1.departmentNum, d1.deptOrder, p.positionStep
